Articles.Content:
one thing i need help with is some of the terms in the persistance for file editing,like what means what, i will kinda just put a fill in the blank sorta thing

name:self explanitory

Brave:self explanitory

dumb:self explanitory

Bads:beast mode activated

state: not known

TOD: not known, but i assume it means time since killed

IDx: not known,

could you please help me label the terms that i dont know
If kerbal s die they die for good?!
No, they'll reappear after a certain amount of time.

I think ToD means time of death.

For state, it can be 1-3(I think). I'm not too sure what they mean, so don't take my word on it, but 1 means in a flight, 3 means available for a flight, and 2 means dead(well, I'm the least sure with 2). I'm sure someone knows them completely though.
